    • handle

      public Integer handle(SetNicknameResponse res)
      Specified by:
      handle in interface ServerResponseHandler
      Parameters:
      res - response from the server
      Returns:
      Integer: 0 if the server DOES NOT need player number 1 if the server NEEDS player number 2 if the action FAILED (game full or error)
